post:
SKB Enterprise, a Dutch hosting company, can offer a great deal for Dell bladeservers with Intel Xeon L5520 CPUs, completed with SSD storage or a large amount of HDD storage: you can choose the option which fits your needs!

Dell bladeserver: Compute L5520

- Intel Xeon L5520 CPU (4x 2.26 GHz with HT)
- 8 GB DDR3 ECC memory
- 120 GB SSD or 2 TB HDD storage!
- 10.000 GB monthly premium bandwidth included
- 1 IPv4 address included
- Datacenter Amsterdam, Netherlands
- Remote reboot

Monthly price only € 25.00 (~30.77 USD)! (Additional discount will apply if you order for a longer term)

[ORDER HERE>>>>](https://clients.skb-enterprise.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=52&promocode=LET_L5520)

First orders receive an ONE TIME DISCOUNT of € 5.00 (~6.15 USD) when placing this order (this will be applied when the order is placed).

**Datacenter and Network details**
We have our owned hardware colocated in the DataOne datacenter near Amsterdam, The Netherlands. We have our own network registration under AS64425.

**Payment methods**
- PayPal
- Bitcoin
- Bank transfer
- iDeal
- SEPA Auto payments

**Company details**
Company name: SKB Enterprise BV
Address: Nagel 30H, 8321RG Urk, The Netherlands
CoC registration: 69737770
VAT: NL857990822B01
